organizationUnitsTooltip: An organisational unit is usually a geographical unit, which exists within a hierarchy.

list: Category combination options are dynamically composed of all of the different combinations of category options which compose a category combination. For example, two categories "Gender" and "Age" might have options such as "Male" or "Female" and "<5 years" or ">5 years." One combination might be "Male <5 years."
Organization Units Group Sets are typically related to the attributes of organization units, such as "ownership" and "type."

downloadNote: Note: Use a unique file name to prevent overwriting.
